name: Babble
startIntroPart1: We have reformed, and now come in peace!
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation
declaringWar: I suggest that you surrender on the immediate! Resistance is futile!
attacked: Dare to challenge the Wehrmacht? Come then and show me how you intend to do so!
defeated: Fine! Fine! Enough! I surrender! Just leave my people be!
introduction: As superior to you in all areas of advancement, i offer peace or obliteration
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: [All] units built in the capital will gain the [Discombobulation] promotion
The yield of all great improvements +[200]%
